definition: to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: She stood close against the door.
You went into far Ku-to-yen, by the river of swirling eddies.
sentences.chinese: 你去了瞿塘滟滪堆，紧挨着那条河，密密麻麻的漩涡。

sentences.english: And by the border of Dan, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Asher.
sentences.chinese: 挨着但的地界，从东到西，是亚设的一分。

sentences.english: It's on your left. It's next to the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 威克牛排酒家在你的左手边，紧挨着停车场。

sentences.english: They made the rounds of the shopping center.
sentences.chinese: 他们在购物中心一家店一家店地挨着逛。

sentences.english: Along the stone corridor of the battlement, two figures were slouched down against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 战壕的石头通道边上，有两个人挨着墙歇着。

sentences.english: Ideally, your buttocks should be right at the back of your chair seat.
sentences.chinese: 正确的坐姿是，你的臀部应当紧挨着座椅的后背。

sentences.english: Keep by me. It's so dark here.
Then the altar will be most holy, and whatever touches it will be holy.
The two factories are next to each other.
And by the border of Zebulun, from the east side unto the west side, Gad a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着西布伦的地界，从东到西，是迦得的一分。

sentences.english: You know, Pier 29, obviously down by the water's super cool.
Samuel sits down next to her and kisses her neck.
sentences.chinese: 随后塞缪尔挨着她坐下，转过头去亲吻她的脖子。

sentences.english: I sat down in a chair next to Amy.
sentences.chinese: 我挨着艾米在椅子上坐下来。

sentences.english: They were not close to the body, but they were fresh and clear.
sentences.chinese: 虽没有挨着尸体，可是既痕迹犹新而又清晰可见。

sentences.english: Joyce by his, shot through the head, never to move again;
sentences.chinese: 乔埃斯紧挨着他，被射穿了脑袋，一动不动。

definition: to be right next to/to lean closely against
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/proximity/thread (of ideas, plots etc)/see also 邊|边[bian1]
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to crowd in/to cram in/to force others aside/to press/to squeeze/to find (time in one's busy schedule)
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to approach/to get close to/to sneak up on/near to
by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)
